verses.content: Aw ka mihai, ka dân thua hin na lo sit unla, Ka baua thuhaiah in na hung daw ro.
Tekhithuin ka bau kâng ka ta, Tiena thu ril hril tahai kha hril suok ka tih.
Chuong chu ei nain ei hriet a, ei lungrilin ei hriet bawk a, Ei thlatuhai khawmin an mi hril bawk kha.
Chuong chu an nauhai kuomah ip nâwm ei nih a, Ruolthar hung dinghai kuoma LALPA inpâkna thu le, A hrâtzie le a thilmaktak thawzie chu hril lem ei tih.
Jakobhai laiah thuinhriettir a sukdet a; Israelhai lai dân a ruot a, Chuong chu ei thlatuhai kuomah thupêkin a pêk a; Anni chun chuong thu chu an nauhai kuomah an inhriettir dingin.
Ruolthar la hung um ding, naupang la hung pieng dinghai chun an hriet theina dingin; Chuonghai chu an tho a, an nauhai kuoma an la hrilsâwng peina dingin;
An beiseina chu Pathienah an innghat theia, Pathien thilthawhai chu an theinghil nawha, A thupêkhai chu an zâwm lemna dingin;
Le, an thlatuhai anga, Suon kâwmaw le hel hmang, Suon lungril siem diklo, Pathien kuoma lungril ringum naw puta an um nawna dingin.
Ephraim thlahai chu râlthuoma inthuoma, thalngul chawiin, Inthaw ni chun an tlânseh a.
Pathien thuthlung chu an zâwm nawh a, A dâna um an nuom naw bawk a;
A thilthawhai chu an thei- nghil a, A thilmak thaw ân hmutirhai khawm chu.
An thlatuhai mithmuah thilmakhai a thaw hlak a, Aigupta rama Zoan phûla chun.
Tuisuoriet chu a sukṭhe phawk a, anni chu ân fe kâitir a, Tuihai chu iengkhat sie khâwm thûr angin ân ngîrtir nguou a.
Sûna chun sûmin a ṭhuoi a, Zânkhawvârin meichawkin a ṭhuoi bawk hlak a.
Thlalêra chun lungpuihai a sukkhawi bawk a, Tui inthûktaka inthawk ang el, ditkhawpa dâwn ding a pêk a.
Lungpuia inthawk chu vadunghai a suksuok a, Tuihai chu vadungpuihai ang elin ân luong thlâktir a.
Chuong sa khawma a chungah thil an la suksuol ta rawp a, Ram ṭâwla chun Achunghnungtak chunga chun an hel a.
An châkna sukre dinga fâk ding hniin, An lungrilin Pathien an fieh a.
Anih, Pathien an hrilhnâwm a, “Thlalêra hin Pathienin daw- kân a buotsai thei am chu?

Ngai ta, lungpui chu a vuokin tuihai kha a hung inkhâw suokin, Vadunghai chu a kuong a liem pûr pûr ta luoh a, Bu khawm a pêk thei nghâl am chu? A mihai ta ding hin sa a buot- sai ding am chu?” an tih a.
Chuongchun, LALPA chun a lo hriet a, a lung a sen tah a, Jakobhai chungah mei a hung chawk suok tah a, Israelhai chungah lunginsenna a hung tah a.
Pathien an ring nawh a, A sandamna khawm an ring naw leiin.
Nisienlakhawm, chungtienga vân dumhai khi thu a pêk a. Vân kawtkhârhai khi a hawngpêk a.
An fâk dingin manna kha an chungah a zuk insûrtir a, Vân bu chu an kuomah a pêk a nih.
Mihriemhaiin mi hrâthai bu chu an fâk a, Khawpna khawpin bu a hung pêk a.
Khaw sak thli chu vânah ân hrângtir a, A thilthawtheinain sim thli chu a ṭhuoi a.
Sa chu pilvut zât rauin an chungah ân sûrtir a, Vatê thla nei chu tuisuorieta phaiphin zât rauin.
An riekhmun laia chun ân tlâktir a, An umna bûk kâwl vêlahai chun.
Chuongchun, an fâk a, an khawp hleh a, An ichâk chu an kuomah a pêk tah a nih.
An châk a la re nawh a, An bu chu an bauah a la um a.
Chuong lai tak chun Pathien lunginsenna chu an chungah a tlah a, An mi thâuhai ṭhenkhat a that a; Israel tlangvâlhai chu a vuok thlûk tâwl a.
Chuong sa khawmin thil an la suksuol ta rawp a, A thilmak thawhai chu an ring chuong nawh.
Chuleiin, an dam sûng nihai chu teplo mei meiin a sukbo pêk a, An dam sûng kumhai chu ṭitnain a sukbo pêk bawk a.
Anni a that poleh ama chu an zawng hlak a, An kîr nâwk a, zîngkâr Pathien an zawng hlak.
Pathien chu an lungpui a nih ti le, Pathien Achunghnungtak chu an intlantu a nih ti an hriet suok hlak.
Nisienlakhawm, ama chu an bauin an inpâk tehlêm a, An leiin a kuomah khêlthu an hril hlak.
An lungril chu ama kuomah ân dik si nawh a, A thuthlunga chun ring an um bawk nawh.

Nisienlakhawm, ama chu lai- natnaa a sip leiin an rîtlona chu a ngaidam a, anni chu a sukbohmang nawh; Anih, vawi tamtak a lunginsenna chu a lâk kîr a, A lunginsenna chu a rêngin a chawktho nuom ngai nawh.
Tisa chau an nih ti a hriet zing a, Thli, lêt nâwk lo dinga hrâng liem hlak ang hi.
Thlalêra khan a chungah an va hel inzingin, Ram ṭâwla khan ama chu an va suklungngai inzing de!
An ngha kîr nâwkin Pathien an fieh a, Israelhai mi inthieng chu an suknuor hlak.
A kut chu an hriet zing nawh a, Anni dotuhaia inthawka a sanhim ni chu an hriet zing ngai nawh.
Khânga Aigupta ramah inchiknahai a sieh a, Zoan phûlah thilmakhai a sie bawk a;
An vadungpuihai chu thisenah ân changtir a, An vadunghai chu thisenah ân changtir bawk kha; chuong- chun, an dâwn thei ta nawh a.
Anni lai tho tamtak a tir a; chuongchun, anni chu a fâk zo a, Uhai a tir bawk a, chuongchun, anni chu a sukbohmang tah a.
An thil kakhai khawm chu tuktulung kuomah a pêk a, An sininrim ra chu khâuṭhikṭhi kuomah a pêk bawk a.
An grêp hruihai chu rielin a sukhlum a, An theichang kûnghai khawm chu vûrin a sukhlum bawk a.
An ranhai khawm chu riel kuomah a pêk a, An ranruolhai khawm chu ṭêk lumtak kuomah a pêk bawk.
A lunginsenna nasatak chu an chungah a thlâk a, Lunginsenna dâm, lungdam nawna dâm, lunginzîngna nasatak dâm hi, Thil ṭha nawtak intluntu tirko pâwl chu.
A lunginsenna ding chun lampui a siempêk a, An hringna chu thinaa in- thawkin a humhim nawh a, An hringna chu hri kuomah a pêk ta lem a.
Aigupta rama nau lutîr po po a sukhlum a, Ham puon inhaia an hrâtna ra hmasa takhai chu:
Nisienlakhawm, ama mihai chu berâm angin a ṭhuoi- suok a, Ranruol angin thlalêra khan a ṭhuoi a.
Himtakin a ṭhuoi a, chuongchun, iengkhawm an ṭi nawh a, Nisienlakhawm, tuisuoriet chun an hmêlmahai chu ân khum zo tah a,
Chun, a hmun inthieng ramri chu a ṭhuoi tlung a, Hi tlâng a kut changtienga a închâwka hin.
Hnam tin chu an hmaah a hnawt suok a, Anni chu hruia inkhi dingin rochanah a siem a. An puon ina chun Israel hnamhai chu ân umtir tah a.
Nisienlakhawm, Pathien Achunghnungtak chu an infieh a, a chungah an hel a, A thu inhhriettirhai chu an zâwm si nawh a.
Ngha kîrin, an thlatuhai angin vervêktakin an thaw ta lem a: Thalngul ringum naw angin an fe kâwi tah a;
An hmun insânghaiin ama chu an suklungsen hlak sih a, An milim siemhaiin an inthîktir bawk a.
Pathienin chu chu a lo hrietin a lunginsen a, Israelhai chu a tirdak ta êm êm a.
Chuongchun, Silo biekbûk, Mihriem laia a puon in sie chu, a mâksan a.
A hrâtna chu salah ân man- tir a, A ropuina chu dotuhai kutah ân mantir ta bawk a.
A mihai chu kâwlhnâm kuomah a pêk a; A rochan chunga chun a lunginsen tah a.
Meiin an tlangvâlhai chu a kânghmang a, An nunghâkhai chun inneina hla hrim hrim an nei ta nawh a.
An thiempuhai chu kâwlhnâma sukthlûkin an um a, An hmeithaihai chu ṭap hrim hrim an ṭap nawh.
Chuong lai chun LALPA chu,mi an in an har angin, a har tah a, Mi hrât uoin leia khêk ang hin.
Ama dotuhai chu a vuok kîr a, Kumkhaw hmingsietna ân hlawtir tah a.
Chu naw khawm chu Josef puon in chu a dit nawh a, Ephraim hnam chu a thlang naw bawk a.
Juda hnam chu a thlang ta lem a, A hmangai Zion tlâng chu.
A in inthieng chu vân insânghai ang khin a bâwl a, Kumkhuoa dinga a suknghet leihnuoi ang hin.
A siehlaw David chu a thlang a, Berâm huona inthawk dâm chun a lâk suok a,
Berâmpui te ṭhuoihaia inthawkin a ṭhuoi suok a, A mihai Jakobhai le Israelhai châwm dingin.
Chuongchun, ama chun a lungril ṭhatna ang peiin anni chu a châwm a, A kut thiemnain a ṭhuoi tah a.
